meanings.definition: Yukos (noun): A former Russian oil company.
meanings.sent1: I read about Yukos in the history book.
meanings.sent2: The Yukos headquarters used to be in Moscow.
meanings.sent3: The students dressed up as Yukos employees for the school play.
meanings.sent4: In its prime, Yukos was a giant in the oil industry.
meanings.sent5: The documentary highlighted the rise and fall of Yukos.

meanings.definition: Yukos (adjective): Relating to or characteristic of the former Russian oil company.
meanings.sent1: The Yukos logo was iconic in the business world.
meanings.sent2: She wore a Yukos-themed t-shirt to the event.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics had a Yukos-like energy.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned factory had a Yukos feel to it.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of Yukos culture.
